thread.title: Turkey, Iran, Russia say will work for stability in Syria

title: Turkey, Iran, Russia say will work for stability in Syria
text:
Turkey, Iran, Russia say will work for stability in Syria 3:28pm EDT - 01:45 
Turkey, Iran and Russia pledged on Wednesday to accelerate efforts to bring stability to Syria, underlining their joint commitment to the country a day after President Donald Trump raised the prospect of withdrawing U.S. troops. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
